actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to impose an excise tax on optional extended warranty and service contracts having an expected cost to the issuer of less than 50 percent of the cost to the consumer.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to impose a 60 percent excise tax on the sale of certain optional extended warranty and service contracts, to be paid by the person receiving the payment from the sale. Makes such taxes nondeductible.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to impose an excise tax on optional extended warranty and service contracts having an expected cost to the issuer of less than 50 percent of the cost to the consumer.
